sentences.en: Agriculture is becoming more and more technically advanced .
sentences.cn: 农业在技术上越来越先进。

sentences.en: He was technically in breach of contract.
sentences.cn: 严格按照法律条文来讲,他是违约了.

sentences.en: Her performance was technically brilliant but lacked feeling.
sentences.cn: 虽然她的表演技艺精湛但缺乏感情.

sentences.en: It's quite clear that the electric car is technically feasible.
sentences.cn: 很清楚,电动汽车在工艺技术上是可行的.

sentences.en: Nude bathing is technically illegal but there are plenty of unspoilt beaches where no one would ever know.
sentences.cn: 严格说来，裸泳是违法的，但在许多人迹罕至的海滩，没人会知道。

sentences.en: Prize - fighting remained popular, though technically illegal, until the 1880 s.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪80年代以前,职业拳击比赛虽然严格来说是不合法的, 但一直很受欢迎.

sentences.en: Technically it is the most advanced equipment ever.
sentences.cn: 从技术上说,这是最先进的设备.

sentences.en: Technically, it was one of our better diplomatic performances.
sentences.cn: 从技术上说, 它是我们在外交上取得的一次较好的成就.

sentences.en: The different kinds of quarks or leptons are known technically as flavors.
sentences.cn: 夸克和轻子的这些个同种类,从技术上看是有特色的.

sentences.en: The film is technically impressive, but lacks real excitement.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的技术给人留下深刻的印象, 但是情节不够刺激.

sentences.en: The second option is technically superior but it demands higher - performance equipment.
sentences.cn: 第2种选择具有技术优越性,但需要高性能的设备.
本届会议严格说来达到了法定人数。

sentences.en: The tomato is technically a fruit, although it is eaten as a vegetable.
sentences.cn: 严格地说,西红柿是一种水果, 尽管它是当作蔬菜吃的.

sentences.en: The tomato is technically a fruit.
sentences.cn: 从专业上讲,番茄是一种果实.

sentences.en: Thus , in terms of what is technically possible, we have higher aspirations.
sentences.cn: 根据技术上所能达到的程度, 我们的标准也就随之提高了.

sentences.en: While Sade's voice isn't technically brilliant it has a quality which is unmistakable.
sentences.cn: 虽然萨德的歌声从技巧方面说谈不上多出色，但很独特。

words.tran_cn: 工艺的，科技的；技术上的；专门的
学术性；专门性；术语，专门语
技师，技术员；技巧纯熟的人
专家管理；专家政治论，技术统治论
技术统治论者；专家政治论者；技术统治

trans.tran_cn: 技术上，学术上，专业上，严格说来
trans.tran_en: concerning the way machines are used to do work
